import React from 'react' import './CSS/navbar.css' import { img } from '../Data' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' const Navbar = () => { const cart_quantity = useSelector(state=>state.cart.quantity) const cart_num = document.querySelector(".navbar-cart-numberbubble") if(cart_quantity === 0){ cart_num.style.display = 'none' } return (
Profile
1
wishlist
{quantity}
Cart
) } export default Navbar
